species.name: gogoat
descriptions: It can tell how its Trainer is feeling by subtle shifts in the grip on its horns. This empathic sense lets them run as if one being.
They inhabit mountainous regions. The leader of the herd is decided by a battle of clashing horns.

abilities.name: sap-sipper
abilities.effect: Absorbs grass moves, raising Attack one stage.

abilities.name: grass-pelt
abilities.effect: Boosts Defense while grassy terrain is in effect.
